name: Goris and Zranky
description:
Synopsis

The evil doctor Zranky has begun his final creation, a mighty zombie creature to conquer the world! But as every evil experiment, something goes wrong. The laboratory begins to lose electricity when a great storm begins and Zranky will have to call his new intern Goris to do the dirty work.

"Goris and Zranky" is a third-person 3d platform game where you play as Goris, Zranky's intern, in his adventure to fulfill his master villainous plan.

Controls Keyboard and Mouse:
  • WASD and Arrows -- Move
  • Spacebar -- Jump
  • "E" -- Interact
  • "Left Click Mouse" -- Pick/Throw object
  • "RightClick Mouse" -- Drop carried object
Controller:
  • Left Stick -- Move
  • Left Stick (Press) -- Jump
  • South Button ("A" for Xbox & "X" for PS) -- Interact
  • Right Trigger -- Pick/Throw object
  • Left Trigger -- Drop carried object
Walkthrough

Videogame made during a Game Jam

  • Theme: Better late than never.
  • Time available: One week
